info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 2:47PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Columbia County through 330 PM EDT... At 247 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Philmont, or near Hudson, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hudson, Claverack, Copake, Philmont, Lorenz Park, Claverack-Red Mills, Ghent, Stockport, Hillsdale, Columbiaville, Greenport Center, Mellenville, Craryville, North Hillsdale, Arnolds Mill, Brick Tavern, Harlemville, Pulvers, Martindale and Green River. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
